Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 6 -- 7.6 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 6 PROPOSITION

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 7.6 MILLS PROPERTY TAX OF FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 6 FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING THE DISTRICT'S FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT, INCLUDING PURCHASING FIRE TRUCKS AND OTHER FIRE FIGHTING EQUIPMENT AND PAYING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 6 of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a seven and six tenths (7.6) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018 (an estimated $177,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment, including purchasing fire trucks and other fire fighting equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
